ADC_UI

Maintain ADC rules via an APEX frontend.  This package implements the methods required to maintain ADC rule groups via an APEX application

Author: Juergen Sieben, ConDeS GmbH

Functions
C_TRUE
function C_TRUE
return adc_util.flag_type

Method for determining truth values. Wrapper around adc_util.C_TRUE

C_FALSE
function C_FALSE
return adc_util.flag_type

Method for determining truth values. Wrapper around adc_util.C_FALSE

designer_selection_changed
procedure designer_selection_changed

Handles selection changes in the hierarchy tree to control the visual appearance of the page.

Is used to deduct the cgr from the selected entry in the designer tree.  It then sets the value and refreshes the rule group report if the value has changed.  Plus, it analyzes which level has been selected and calls the respective DESIGNER_SHOW_FORM method
